# Variables

ZetaSQL specifies the syntax for the variable statements `SET` and
`UNSET`.

## SET

```
SET variable = constant_value;
```

Sets a runtime variable.

## UNSET

```
UNSET variable;
```

Unsets a runtime variable.

<!-- END CONTENT -->
